scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development PROXY_ENV=development LOGIN_TYPE=development umi dev
scripts.start:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=development PROXY_ENV=development LOGIN_TYPE=localhost umi dev
scripts.start:test2: cross-env NODE_ENV=development2 PROXY_ENV=development2 LOGIN_TYPE=development2 umi dev
scripts.start:pro: cross-env NODE_ENV=development PROXY_ENV=production LOGIN_TYPE=production umi dev
scripts.build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=production  PROXY_ENV=development LOGIN_TYPE=development umi build
scripts.build:dev2: cross-env NODE_ENV=production  PROXY_ENV=development LOGIN_TYPE=development2 umi build
scripts.build:pro: cross-env NODE_ENV=production  PROXY_ENV=production LOGIN_TYPE=localhost umi build
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production  PROXY_ENV=production LOGIN_TYPE=production umi build
